articles.title: April Holidays of DPRK Commemorated Abroad
articles.content:
April Holidays of DPRK Commemorated Abroad 
    Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- A lecture and a film show were hosted by the Left United Party of Romania, a meeting by the People's Rally for Socialism of Democratic Congo and a reading session of leader Kim Jong Il's famous work "On Some Questions in Understanding the Juche Philosophy" by the College of Culture of Mongolia from March 30 to April 3 to commemorate the Day of the Sun and the 13th anniversary of Kim Jong Il's election as chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission.
 On show at the venues of the functions were famous works of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and pictures illustrating their immortal feats in Songun leadership.
 After watching the Korean film "He Will Always Be Alive in the Hearts of Humankind", the vice-chairman of Left United Party of Romania said no one can match the President in the great spirit of internationalism, many leaders worldwide highly praise him as a political veteran and benevolence incarnate and the great exploits performed by him for the world revolution will always be cherished in the hearts of the progressives.
 General Secretary of the People's Rally for Socialism of Democratic Congo Jean Baptiste Nkoy said in his report at the meeting that the President took the road of revolution in his early years and made immortal contributions to the Korean revolution and the cause of global independence.    
 Meanwhile, meetings were held by the Bulgarian Anti-Fascist Union, the Bulgaria-Korea Friendship Association and the Egypt-Korea Friendship Association and a reading session and a photo exhibition by the Addis Ababa Youth Association of Ethiopia from April 2 to 5 to mark  the Day of the Sun.

articles.title: Special Information Bulletin Issued in Egypt
articles.content:
Special Information Bulletin Issued in Egypt 
    Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- The Egypt-Korea Friendship Association issued a special information bulletin titled "Undying feats performed by President Kim Il Sung" on April 5 on the occasion of the Day of the Sun.
 The bulletin in an article praised Kim Il Sung, the founder of the great Juche idea and the Songun idea based on it, for liberating Korea, defeating the U.S. imperialists, who boasted of being the "strongest" in the world, in the Fatherland Liberation War and steadily advancing the revolution and construction despite an acute confrontation with the imperialist allied forces after the war.    
 The DPRK advancing under the banner of Songun is instilling strength and courage into all the countries aspiring after independence against imperialism, it stressed.

Cuban Embassy Officials Visit Mansudae Art Studio
articles.content:
Cuban Embassy Officials Visit Mansudae Art Studio 
    Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- Cuban Ambassador to the DPRK Ruben Perez Valdes and embassy officials visited the Mansudae Art Studio on Tuesday on the occasion of the Day of the Sun.
 They went round the Korean Painting Creative Group and the art works exhibition hall, while being briefed on the conversion of the studio into a Juche-based and comprehensive base of art creation.

S. Korea-U.S. "Combined Forces Command" under Fire
articles.content:
S. Korea-U.S. "Combined Forces Command" under Fire 
    Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- The People for Achieving Peace and Reunification in south Korea reportedly issued a statement on April 7 at which it strongly demanded the United States and the south Korean military authorities totally withdraw their operation plans for a preemptive attack on the north.
 It has been clearly disclosed that the joint landing exercise committed at the Manripho beach in Thaean County, South Chungchong Province, on March 30 is a drill for a war against the north supported by the south Korea-U.S. "Combined Forces Command", the statement said, stressing that it has been proved that the command's assertion that the current joint military exercise is a "defensive drill" is a sheer lie.

Floral Basket to Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Floral Basket to Kim Jong Il
    Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il was presented with a floral basket and a congratulatory letter by the diplomatic corps here on the occasion of the Day of the Sun and the 13th anniversary of his election as chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission.
 The floral basket and congratulatory letter were handed to DPRK Foreign Minister Paek Nam Sun by Bashir Ramadan Khalifa Abu Janah, secretary of the People's Bureau of the Great Socialist People's Libyan Arab Jamahiriya who is doyen of the diplomatic corps, on Wednesday.

articles.title: Hot Spring Water Used in Rational Way
articles.content:
Hot Spring Water Used in Rational Way
    Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- Myongchon County in North Hamgyong Province has been well known for its hot springs in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
 There are famous Mt. Chilbo, the Hwangjin, Sari, Taho and Manho Spas in the county. And 50-98 degrees C of spring water gushes out in different places of the county.
 It has made a good use of the natural and geographical conditions.
 A catfish farm covering an area of more than 1,000 square meters has been built in the Tokpho area. It produces thousands of adults and over 100,000 fry a year.
 People in Taho-ri cultivate various kinds of vegetables with hot spring water in the Chilbosan Greenhouse Vegetable Farm with an acreage of 5 hectares even in winter. And they have introduced the hot spring water into heating public buildings including nurseries and kindergartens and farm dwelling houses.    
 Those in Manho-ri are making use of hot spring water in producing nutritive fruit-bearing vegetables at two greenhouses all the year round.
 There are hot spring water bath-houses in Yangjong-ri, Manho-ri, Kocham-ri and all other ris of the county. The hot spring water is applied to sprouting seeds in spring.
 Modernly furnished sanatoriums have been built in the county to improve health of working people.

articles.title: Delegations and Delegate to Kimilsungia Festival Arrive
articles.content:
Delegations and Delegate to Kimilsungia Festival Arrive
    Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- Delegations of the Chinese region and Koreans in China of the Society for Sponsoring the Propagation of Immortal Flower and a delegation of Koreans in the U.S. of the Society for Sponsoring the Propagation of Immortal Flower led by Ri Pyong Sang, head of the American Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia Association, a delegation of the Japanese Society for Loving Kimjongilia led by Representative Member Tsutomu Minatoyama, a delegation of the Japanese region of the Society for Sponsoring the Propagation of Immortal Flower,  a delegate of the Southeast Asian region of the Society  for Sponsoring the Propagation of Immortal Flower, Koreans in Japan Kim Kap Saeng and Kim In Gwon arrived in Pyongyang to participate in the 8th Kimilsungia Festival.

articles.title: Congratulations to Jamaican Prime Minister
articles.content:
Congratulations to Jamaican Prime Minister
    Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- Pak Pong Ju, premier of the DPRK Cabinet, sent a congratulatory message to Portia Simpson Miller, on the latter's assumption of office as prime minister of Jamaica.
 Expressing the belief that the friendly relations between the two countries would develop favorably in the mutual interests, the message wished him success in his work.

Reception Given
    Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- A reception was given by the military attaches' corps here on Wednesday on the occasion of the 13th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's election as chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission. 
 Present on invitation were general officers and officers of the Korean People's Army. 
 On hand were members of the corps.    
 Speeches were made there.
